string.name: wp_pn_wrong_org_ios
string.context: iOS only alert message telling the user that they received a push notification for a different organization

resources.string: Vous avez reçu une notification d\'un autre établissement de santé.

string.name: wp_pn_wrong_org_logout_ios
string.context: iOS only alert message telling the user that they received a push notification for a different organization and prompt the user to logout

resources.string: Vous avez reçu une notification d\'un autre établissement de santé. Voulez-vous vous déconnecter maintenant et vous rendre sur le site de cet établissement?

string.name: wp_pn_wrong_org_android
string.context: Appears when patient logs in a different organization that the push notification is for

resources.string: Désolé, cette notification concerne un autre établissement de santé.

string.name: wp_pn_wrong_org_logout_android
string.context: Appears when patient logs in a different organization that the push notification is for and prompt to log out

resources.string: Désolé, cette notification concerne un autre établissement de santé. Voulez-vous vous déconnecter maintenant et vous rendre sur le site de cet établissement?

string.name: wp_apple_handoff_short_name
string.context: The proper noun for Apple's Handoff technology. This is found at https://developer.apple.com/handoff/. This string is passed into other mychart strings that use this word in the sentence.

string.name: wp_apple_handoff_long_name
string.context: The proper noun for Apple's Handoff technology, prefixed by the name of the company (Apple). The handof is found at https://developer.apple.com/handoff/. This string is passed into other mychart strings that use this word in the sentence.

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_title_ios
string.context: Alert message header for the message telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is incorrect for the Apple Watch Handoff task they just activated. %1$@ is Apple Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_long_name)

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_selection_message
string.context: Alert message telling the user that the organization they are attempting to switch to is incorrect for the Apple Watch Handoff task they just activated. %1$@ is the correct organization's name. %2$@ is Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_short_name)

resources.string: La tâche %2$@ sur Apple Watch est pour %1$@. Se connecter ici pour continuer.

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_postlogin_title
string.context: Alert title telling the user that they received a Handoff task from their Apple Watch for a different organization. %1$@ is Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_short_name)

string.name: wp_handoff_wrong_org_logout_ios
string.context: Alert message telling the user that they received a Handoff task from their Apple Watch for a different organization and prompt the user to logout. %1$@ is Handoff (wp_apple_handoff_short_name)

resources.string: Vous avez reçu une tâche %1$@ sur Apple Watch d\'un autre établissement de santé. Voulez-vous vous déconnecter maintenant et accéder à cet établissement?

string.name: wp_community_link_my_accounts_title
string.context: The title of the link my accounts activity screen

string.name: wp_community_link_my_accounts_account_settings_row_subtitle
string.context: Appears as a subtitle for the Link My Accounts row in the Account Settings activity.

resources.string: Connectez vos comptes d\'autres établissements de santé pour créer un affichage unifié de vos informations de santé.

string.name: wp_alert_happy_together_onboarding
string.context: Appears as an alert to introduce H2G feature if the H2G data may be available and the alert has not been read and dismissed before. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name

resources.string: Découvrez comment %1$@ peut rassembler vos informations de santé venant des divers établissements où vous et votre famille recevez des soins en un affichage unifié.

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_title_generic
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page as the title

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_title_connection_update
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page as the title

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_body_text
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page as the body to explain what the E icon means

resources.string: Quand vous voyez cette icône aux emplacements suivants, cela signifie que les informations proviennent d\'un autre établissement.

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_go_to_link_my_accounts
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page or as a toast message telling the users where to go to make connection changes later.

resources.string: Pour apporter des modifications ultérieurement, accédez à Paramètres du compte et sélectionnez Lier mes comptes.

string.name: wp_community_onboarding_go_to_website
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together onboarding static page telling the user to go to the website to use the account linking feature.

resources.string: Pour apporter des modifications à la connexion, accédez au site Web et sélectionnez Lier mes comptes.

string.name: wp_community_update_my_account_title
string.context: Title displayed for the update my account MO screen launched by H2G++ activities

string.name: wp_h2g_received_from
string.context: Text indicating that the data was received from a Happy Together organization. %1$@ is the name of the organization

string.name: wp_community_update_complete_notification_title
string.context: Title displayed for the notification/toast which show the update is complete for h2g++ organizations. %1$@ is local organization name, %2$@ is the external org name, %3$@ is the patient name, %4$@ is the place holder for Tap to view for notification

resources.string: %1$@ a bien mis à jour les informations provenant de: %2$@ pour %3$@. %4$@

string.name: wp_community_update_complete_with_error_notification_title
string.context: Title displayed for the notification/toast which show the update has error for h2g++ organizations. %1$@ is local organization name, %2$@ is the external org name, %3$@ is the patient name, %4$@ is the place holder for Tap to view for notification

resources.string: Échec de la mise à jour par %1$@ des informations provenant de: %2$@ pour %3$@. %4$@

string.name: wp_community_update_complete_with_success_and_error_notification_title
string.context: Title displayed for the notification/toast which show the update is complete for h2g++ organizations. %1$@ is local organization name, %2$@ is the external org name updated successfully, %3$@ is the external org name failed updating, %4$@ is the patient name, %5$@ is the place holder for Tap to view for notification

resources.string: %1$@ a bien mis à jour les informations provenant de: %2$@, mais la mise à jour des informations provenant de %3$@ a échoué pour %4$@. %5$@

string.name: wp_community_tap_view_view_message
string.context: message dislayed in the notification when the update is complete.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_none
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23). This will appear in all caps.

plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the AM, if they are using 12 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_12Hour_PM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the PM, if they are using 12 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_24Hour_AM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the AM, if they are using 24 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_fuzzy_24Hour_PM
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) in the PM, if they are using 24 hour time. This will appear in all caps.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_surgical_details_title_time_full
plurals.context: Title for the section containing surgical details telling the user that the following surgery is scheduled to be performed on %1$@ date (format: En-US Tuesday, November 23) at %2$@ time. This will appear in all caps.

string.name: wp_appointment_date_time_zone_format
string.context: Format for showing %1$@ time with the corresponding %2$@ time zone abbreviation.

string.context: Formatted title for an appointment in the AM if the device is in 12 hour time format, where %1$@ is the appointment date (format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.name: wp_appointment_date_label_fuzzy_12Hour_PM
string.context: Formatted title for an appointment in the PM if the device is in 12 hour time format, where %1$@ is the appointment date (format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.name: wp_appointment_date_label_fuzzy_24Hour_AM
string.context: Formatted title for an appointment in the AM if the device is in 24 hour time format, where %1$@ is the appointment date (format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.context: Title for an inpatient-type calendar event (hospital stay or upcoming delivery) for a proxy subject that includes the visit type. %1$@ is the visit type of the stay and %2$@ is the subject's name. ex. 'Hospital Visit for Bobby Smith'

plurals.context: Label informing the patient how many procedures will be performed in the associated admission where %1$@ is the number of procedures

string.context: The voiceover text for an visit cell specific to hospital admissions. %1$@ is the type (upcoming admission /delivery) and %2$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937)

string.context: The voiceover text for an visit cell specific to hospital admissions where they have completed e-check in. %1$@ is the type (upcoming admission /delivery), %2$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937) and %3$@ is the custom string for 'eCheck-in'

string.name: wp_appointment_voiceover_card_title_with_barcode_and_provider
string.context: The voiceover text for an visit cell specific to hospital admissions where they have completed e-check in. %1$@ is the type (upcoming admission /delivery), %2$@ is the provider name %3$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937) and %4$@ is the custom string for 'eCheck-in'

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_expired
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has expired.

resources.string: Une proposition pour un nouveau rendez-vous a expiré.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_accepted
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been accepted by another user whose name we know. %1$@ is the name of the MyChart user that accepted the appointment, %2$@ is the date of the new appointment and %3$@ is the time of the new appointment.

resources.string: %1$@ a accepté cette proposition de rendez-vous. Votre nouveau rendez-vous aura lieu le %2$@ à %3$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_accepted_no_user
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been accepted by another unknown user. %1$@ is the date of the new appointment and %2$@ is the time of the new appointment.

resources.string: Cette proposition de rendez-vous a été acceptée en votre nom. Votre nouveau rendez-vous aura lieu le %1$@ à %2$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_declined
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been declined by another user whose name we know. %1$@ is the name of the MyChart user that declined the appointment.

resources.string: %1$@ a refusé une proposition de rendez-vous en votre nom.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_declined_no_user
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been declined by another unknown user.

resources.string: Une proposition pour un nouveau rendez-vous a été refusée en votre nom.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_cell_unavailable
string.context: Message displayed for an appointment offer that has been deleted or is otherwise not available.

resources.string: Une proposition pour un nouveau rendez-vous n\'est plus disponible.

string.name: wp_appointment_detailed_calendar_event_title
string.context: Shows as the event title in a calendar event when creating a calendar event from an appointment. %1$@ is the visit type. %2$@ is the provider name.

string.name: wp_appointment_default_calendar_event_title
string.context: The title for a created calendar event for a given appointment when only the summary is getting copied.

string.name: wp_appointment_default_calendar_visit_type
string.context: Displays as the visit type (in the screen header) when there is no visit type attached to the appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_title_proxy
string.context: Title for an appointment's calendar event that includes the visit type, provider name, and subject's name. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment. %2$@ is the provider's name for the appointment. %3$@ is the subject's name for whom the appointment is made. ex. MyChart Office Visit with Harriet Sanderson M.D. for Bobby Smith

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_title
string.context: Shows as the event title in a calendar event when creating a calendar event from an appointment. %1$@ is the visit type. %2$@ is the provider name.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_appointment_time
string.context: Tells the user their scheduled appointment time for the current appointment. %1$@ is the appointment time. The appointment time could be either the time string or an alernate string like AM or PM or TBD

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_arrival_location
string.context: Tells the user arrival location for their current appointment. %1$@ is the arrival location.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_notes_phone
string.context: Added to the notes of a created calendar event from the selected appointment. Indicates the phone number associated with the appointment. %1$@ is the phone number.

string.name: wp_appointments_calendar_generic_summary
string.context: Added to the notes of a created event for an appointment that is being added to the calendar. Tells the user to check MyChart for appointment details. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name.

resources.string: Consultez %1$@ pour les détails du rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_add_success
string.context: Tells the user that the appointment was successfully added as an event to his calendar.

resources.string: Le rendez-vous a bien été ajouté au calendrier

string.name: wp_appointment_calendar_add_failure
string.context: Tells the user that the appointment was not added as an event to his calendar due to an error

resources.string: Une erreur a empêché l\'ajout de ce rendez-vous au calendrier.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_error_title
string.context: Title for alert when user does not have security to view details.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message_org_proxy
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details. %1$@ is the organization name. %2$@ is the patient's name.

resources.string: %1$@ ne dispose pas de détails sur le rendez-vous de %2$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message_proxy
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details. %1$@ is the patient's name.

resources.string: Cette organisation ne dispose pas de détails sur le rendez-vous de %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message_org
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: %1$@ ne dispose pas de détails sur votre rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_details_unavailable_message
string.context: Message for alert when user does not have access to details.

resources.string: Cette organisation ne dispose pas de détails sur votre rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_too_early
string.context: Message displayed if the user tries to join a video visit before the early start duration. %1$@ is the number of minutes in advance that the visit may be joined.

resources.string: Vous ne pouvez pas rejoindre cette consultation vidéo plus de %1$@ minutes en avance.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_cannot_start_generic
string.context: Error message when something is preventing the user from starting a video visit.

resources.string: Impossible de commencer la consultation vidéo

string.name: wp_appointment_not_allowed_to_join_video_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have the DENY joining video visit security point

resources.string: Vous n\'êtes pas autorisé(e) à rejoindre la consultation vidéo.

string.name: wp_appointment_cannot_join_video_visit_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a rule preventing them from being able to join a video visit

resources.string: Vous ne pouvez pas rejoindre la consultation vidéo pour le moment.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_mike_camera_permission
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a video visit open but they have prevented MyChart from having access to the camera and the microphone. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ n\'a pas l\'autorisation d\'accéder à votre caméra et microphone. Pour accorder l\'autorisation, modifiez les paramètres de la caméra et du microphone dans Paramètres > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_camera_permission
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a video visit open but they have prevented MyChart from having access to the camera. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ n\'a pas l\'autorisation d\'accéder à votre caméra. Pour accorder l\'autorisation, modifiez les paramètres de la caméra dans Paramètres > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_mike_permission
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they have a video visit open but they have prevented MyChart from having access to the microphone. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ n\'a pas l\'autorisation d\'accéder à votre microphone. Pour accorder l\'autorisation, modifiez les paramètres du microphone dans Paramètres > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_no_calendar_permission
string.context: The message displayed to the user when we are unable to add an appointment to their calendar because they have not given us access to their calendar. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ n\'a pas l\'autorisation d\'accéder à votre calendrier. Pour accorder l\'autorisation, modifiez les paramètres du calendrier dans Paramètres > %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_device_no_mike_camera
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have both a microphone and front camera on their device.

resources.string: Impossible de trouver une caméra frontale ou un microphone sur votre appareil. Vous pouvez éventuellement effectuer cette visite sur le site Web.

string.name: wp_appointment_device_no_camera
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have a front camera on their device.

resources.string: Impossible de trouver une caméra frontale sur votre appareil. Vous pouvez éventuellement effectuer cette visite sur le site Web.

string.name: wp_appointment_device_no_mike
string.context: Message displayed when the user does not have a microphone on their device.

resources.string: Impossible de trouver un microphone sur votre appareil. Vous pouvez éventuellement effectuer cette visite sur le site Web.

string.name: wp_appointment_video_conference_full_message
string.context: Message displayed when the user is trying to joing a video visit and they have passed the hardware test, but they cannot join because the conference is full.

string.context: Title for the alert when the user cannot join a video visit because the conference is full.

resources.string: Nous avons trouvé une caméra, un microphone et une connexion Internet active. Vous pouvez rejoindre des consultations vidéo avec cet appareil.

resources.string: Impossible de confirmer votre rendez-vous pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

resources.string: Afficher plus d\'informations sur vos rendez-vous à venir.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_view_visit_guide_button_title
string.context: Title of button to view your visit guide

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_new_appointment_title
string.context: Title of the new appointment offer. Should be uppercase.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_scheduled_appointment_title
string.context: Title of the current appointment in the offer cell. Should be uppercase.

string.context: Alert title for alerts regarding the list of upcoming appointments

string.name: wp_future_appointment_past_appointments_alert_title
string.context: Alert title for alerts regarding the list of past appointments.

string.name: wp_future_appointments_cancel_appointment_button_title
string.context: Text displayed on cancel appointment button on the appointment card.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_decline_button_title
string.context: Title of the button on the waitlist offer.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_accept_button_title
string.context: Title of the button to accept the new appointment offer.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_keep_button_title
string.context: The title of the button to decline an appointment offer for a linked appointment. The user will 'keep' their current appointment and decline the offer.

string.name: wp_appointments_default_activity_title
string.context: Default name of the Appointments feature. Overridden by custom strings entry.

string.name: wp_appointments_list_schedule_bottom_button_title
string.context: The text for the button to schedule a new appointment from the appointments page. Tapping this button takes you to the direct scheduling workflow.

string.name: wp_appointments_list_happy_together_failed_organizations_popup_title
string.context: Title of the popup that displays the external organizations that we did not receive data from

string.name: wp_appointment_cancelled_request_popup_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user to inform them they have successfully sent a cancelation request.

resources.string: Votre demande d\'annulation a bien été envoyée.

string.name: wp_future_appointments_close_modal_controller_button_title
string.context: Button to close the future appointments view when presented modalling in library

string.name: wp_future_appointment_connecting_to_video_message
string.context: Message displayed when the launching the video conference.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_already_accept_alert_title
string.context: The title of the alert displayed to the user when they try to accept an appointment offer but it fails because it has already been accepted by someone else for them.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_already_accept_alert_message
string.context: The message displayed to the user when they try to accept an appointment offer but it fails because it has already been accepted by someone else for them.

resources.string: Quelqu\'un d\'autre a déjà accepté ce rendez-vous en votre nom.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_already_declined_alert_title
string.context: Title of message displayed to the user when they request to accept an appointment offer but it had already been declined by another user.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_already_declined_alert_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user when they request to accept an appointment offer but it had already been declined by another user.

resources.string: Quelqu\'un a déjà refusé cette proposition de rendez-vous en votre nom.

string.name: wp_wait_list_appointment_not_scheduled_alert_title
string.context: Title of the message displayed to the user when the request to accept an appointment offer has failed.

string.name: wp_wait_list_appointment_not_scheduled_alert_message
string.context: The message displayed to the user when the request to schedule an appointment offer fails but may be successful if they retry again later.

resources.string: Impossible de prendre ce rendez-vous pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

string.name: wp_wait_list_decline_offer_failure_alert_title
string.context: Title of the message displayed to the user when their request to decline an appointment offer fails.

resources.string: Échec du refus de la proposition

string.name: wp_wait_list_decline_offer_failure_alert_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user when their request to decline an appointment offer fails.

resources.string: Impossible de refuser cette proposition pour le moment. Votre rendez-vous actuel n\'a pas été modifié. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

string.name: wp_wait_list_offer_expired_alert_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user in a pop-up when they request to schedule an appointment offer but it had already expired.

resources.string: Cette proposition de nouveau rendez-vous est expirée.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_copay_details_message_telemedicine
string.context: details of prep item for paying a copay

resources.string: Payez votre participation forfaitaire avec une carte de crédit. Votre compte ne sera pas débité avant le début de votre visite.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_external_actions_unavailable_banner
string.context: Banner indicating that actions cannot be taken on external appointments from within the local app. Parameter is the name of the external organization

resources.string: Veuillez vous connecter au portail %1$@ pour effectuer des actions pour ce rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_some_actions_available_external_banner
string.context: Banner indicating that some actions cannot be taken on external appointments from within the local app. Parameter is the name of the external organization.

resources.string: Il est possible que certaines actions ne soient pas disponibles. Pour plus d\'options d\'actions, veuillez vous connecter à votre portail %1$@.

string.name: wp_appointments_default_echeckin_name
string.context: The word 'eCheck-In'. Can also be customized by the customer.

string.name: wp_appointments_echeckin_name_inpatient
string.context: The word 'Update Information'. Can also be customized by the customer.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_cancel_video_init_alert_message
string.context: Message displayed when the user tries to cancel the sign in process for a video visit.

resources.string: Vous pouvez revenir à cette visite jusqu\'à la fin de votre horaire de rendez-vous en appuyant sur \'Commencer visite\'.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_cancel_video_init_alert_title
string.context: Title of the alert displayed when the user tries to cancel the sign in process for a video visit.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_cancel_video_init_leave_action_title
string.context: The yes button for canceling the video visit.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_cancel_video_init_stay_action_title
string.context: The no button for canceling the video visit.

string.name: wp_appointment_payment_title_with_visit_title
string.context: The title of the a row in the future appointment details page that indicates that a particular appointment has a payment associated with it. %1$@ is the name/title of the appointment with the payment associated.

string.name: wp_appointment_copay_title_with_visit_title
string.context: The title of the a row in the future appointment details page that indicates that a particular appointment has a copay associated with it. %1$@ is the name/title of the appointment with the copay associated.

string.name: wp_appointment_prepay_title_with_visit_title
string.context: The title of the a row in the future appointment details page that indicates that a particular appointment has a prepay associated with it. %1$@ is the name/title of the appointment with the prepay associated.

string.name: wp_appointment_echeckin_composite_number_completed_title
string.context: A string telling the user how many appointments they have completed echeckin for. This happens for appointment panels which are comprised multiple appointments - like child appointments. This is telling the user how many of those child appointments they have completed echeckin for. %1$@ is the echeckin name (i.e. eCheck-in - however this can be customized by customers). %2$@ is the number of appointment the user has completed echeckin for. %3$@ is the total number of child appointments that have echeckin available.

resources.string: Vous avez complété %1$@ pour %2$@ des %3$@ parties de cette visite.

string.name: wp_appointment_payment_name
string.context: The word for Payments which is the word for how much the patient will need to pay for their upcoming appointment.

string.name: wp_composite_appointment_total_payment_due
string.context: String telling the user how much the total payment is for the appointment. In this scenario, the appointment is a panel meaning it is comprised of multiple child appointments. Each child appointment could have its own payment, so this string is showing what the combined/total payment is for the entire panel. %1$@ is the payment amount in dollars (i.e. $30.50)

string.name: wp_composite_appointment_total_payment_paid
string.context: String tell the user how much of the total payment for the appointment that they have already paid. In this scenario, the appointment is a panel meaning it is comprised of multiple child appointments. Each child appointment could have its own payment, so this string is showing what the combined/total amount they have paid for the entire panel. %1$@ is the amount they have already paid (i.e. $30.50)

string.name: wp_future_appointment_not_confirmed_detail_message
string.context: details of prep item for confirming an appointment

resources.string: Confirmez maintenant pour ne pas recevoir de rappel téléphonique pour ce rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_future_appointment_not_confirmed_multiple_detail_message
string.context: details of prep item for confirming multiple appointments

resources.string: Confirmez maintenant pour ne pas recevoir de rappel téléphonique pour ces rendez-vous.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_duration_minutes_hours
plurals.context: String telling the user how long their upcoming appointment will be. %1$@ is the number of hours. %2$@ is the number of minutes.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_duration_hours
plurals.context: String telling the user how long their upcoming appointment will be. %1$@ is the number of hours.

string.name: wp_appointment_duration_minutes
string.context: String telling a user how long their appointment will be. %1$@ is the number of minutes.

string.name: wp_appointment_cancellation_linked_appointments_table_header
string.context: Header for the list of linked appointments that will be cancelled by cancelling the selected appointments.

resources.string: Le rendez-vous que vous annulez est lié aux rendez-vous suivants, qui seront également annulés.

string.name: wp_appointment_cancellation_comments_prompt_text
string.context: Placeholder text that hints the user to add comments while canceling an appointment.

string.name: wp_past_appointment_avs_button_text
string.context: Button text for the link to the AVS / past appointment details. The trademark ® logo should not be translated. It should only be included in the en-US version of this string.

resources.string: Afficher le Résumé pour le patient

string.name: wp_past_appointment_notes_button_text
string.context: Button text for the link to the notes for a past appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_discharged_date_string
string.context: The string that shows the discharged date for the patient's past admission to the hospital. %1$@ is the date string the patient was discharged from the hospital. The date strings will be formatted like 'March 7, 2019'

string.name: wp_appointment_admission_date_string
string.contoext: The string that shows the date a patient was admitted to the hospital. %1$@ is the date string the patient was admitted on. The date strings will be formatted like 'March 7, 2019'

string.name: wp_past_appointment_avs_button_text_non_epic
string.context: Button text for the link to the past appointment details for a non-epic (H2G++) past appointment

resources.string: Afficher les détails de la visite

string.name: wp_appointment_panel_visit_title_two_component_appointments
string.context: The title displayed for a panel of appointments when the panel appointment itself does not have a display name. Instead, we construct the visit title name using the visit titles of the first two child visits in the panel. %1$@ is the visit title of the first child visit. %2$@ is the visit title of the second child visit.

string.name: wp_appointment_panel_visit_title_more_than_two_component_appointments
string.context: The title displayed for a panel of appointments when the panel appointment itself does not have a display name. Instead, we construct the visit title name using the visit title of the first child visit and then displaying how many other child visits there are. %1$@ is the visit title of the first child visit. %2$@ is the number of the remaining visits in the panel appointment.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_direct_scheduled_success_message
plurals.context: String telling the user that they have successfully scheduled one or more appointments.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_request_scheduled_success_message
plurals.context: String telling the user that they have successfully requested to schedule one or more appointments.
plurals.item: Votre demande de rendez-vous a été reçue.
Votre demande de rendez-vous a été reçue.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_cancel_appointment_button_title
plurals.context: text for a button that a user can press to cancel an upcoming appointment.

string.name: wp_linked_appointment_cancellation_related_prompt
string.context: Title of a row in a table that tells the user which appointments that they are about to cancel. This string will be followed by another string saying something like '3 related appointments'

string.name: wp_linked_appointment_cancellation_related_text
string.context: Row in a table that is telling the user that they are cancelling mutliple related appointments. This string will be preceded by a prompt that says something like 'Cancel'. %1$@ is the number of related appointments that the user will be cancelling.

string.name: wp_ed_visit_expected_time
string.context: Displayed in appointment details activity in lieu of an actual time for Emergency Department visits, because the arrival time for ED visits is more fluid than other appointments

string.name: wp_ed_visit_expected_date
string.context: Date when the patient is expected at the emergency department, where %1$@ is the date. In English, the date will be of the form Saturday, April 24

string.name: wp_future_visit_change_visit_button_title_cancel
string.context: Title for button to cancel the visit.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_phone_alert_title
string.context: Alert title telling the user that a phone call is required to cancel the selected visit.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_phone_alert_message
string.context: Alert tells user that a call is required to cancel this visit. %1$@ is the number to call.

resources.string: Veuillez appeler le %1$@ pour annuler cette visite.

string.name: wp_visit_error_cancel_alert_message
string.context: Alert tells the user that the selected visit cannot be cancelled.

string.name: wp_visit_cancelled_direct_popup_message
string.context: Message displayed to the user to inform them they have successfully canceled a visit.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_fail_title
string.context: Title of alert sent to user when we are unable to retrieve the details on how to cancel a visit.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_fail_explanation
string.context: Message displayed to user when we are unable to retrieve the cancel details of a visit and thus cannot cancel the visit. %1$@ is the phone number to call.

resources.string: Impossible d\'annuler votre visite pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard ou appeler le %1$@ pour annuler cette visite.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_fail_generic
string.context: Alert appears when a visit cancellation fails for an unknown reason

resources.string: Impossible d\'annuler votre rendez-vous pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

string.name: wp_visit_cancel_button_caption
string.context: Caption for button allowing user to cancel an upcoming visit.

string.name: wp_cancelvisit_attempt_failure_message
string.context: Appears when the user attempts to cancel a visit and the request fails.

string.name: wp_cancelappt_commentmaxlengthwarning
string.context: Appears when the user is exceeding the maximum allowed comment length. %1$@ is the maximum number of allowed characters in a comment

resources.string: Les commentaires ne peuvent pas dépasser %1$@ caractères.

string.name: wp_appointment_cancel_request_subject
string.context: Do not translate if your language cannot be represented with the Western European Latin script (windows-1252 code page). Default subject for an appointment cancellation request message. Can be seen in mobile Message Outbox and in Hyperspace inBasket

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_expire_today
string.context: The label informing the user when the appointment offer will expire if it expires today. %1$@ is the time the appointment expires(format: En-Us 8:26 AM). The characters '^' should be around the text for Today in order to highlight it red when displayed. They will be stripped after locating the today text.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_expire_tomorrow
string.context: The label informing the user when the appointment offer will expire if it expires tomorrow. %1$@ is the time the appointment expires(format: En-Us 8:26 AM). The characters '^' should be around the text for Tomorrow in order to highlight it red when displayed. They will be stripped after locating the tomorrow text.

string.name: wp_appointment_offer_expire
string.context: The label informing the user when the appointment offer will expire. %1$@ is the date (localized day of week, mm/dd/yy) and %2$@ is the time the appointment expires(format: En-Us 8:26 AM).

string.name: wp_appointment_standalone_fast_pass_offer_prompt
string.context: Label text that informs the user that they can accept a wait list offer for an appointment they don't have an appointment for already

resources.string: Vous pouvez choisir une heure disponible pour votre rendez-vous mis sur liste d\'attente.

string.name: wp_appointment_linked_fast_pass_offer_prompt
string.context: Message on top of the waitlist selection in the appointments view. Lets the user know that they hacve the option to select an earlier appoinment time

resources.string: Vous pouvez accepter une horaire plus tôt pour ce rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_next_step_extra_steps_title
string.context: The appointment arrival alert title after user confirms their arrival, but they still have steps to complete

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_next_step_echeckin_message
string.context: The appointment arrival alert message for a sign in with available echeckin. %1$@ is the eCheckin custom name

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_onboarding_announcement
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, alerting the user to the appearance of full-screen onboarding , to introduce the user to the appointment arrival feature.

resources.string: Alerte. Le processus d\'accueil est apparu pour vous présenter la fonctionnalité d\'arrivée des rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_onboarding_activity_title
string.context: Title of onboarding activity for the Appointment Arrival feature, where the user is introduced to the feature and asked if they want to enable it.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_onboarding_activity_explanation
string.context: Text displayed in the onboarding activity for Appointment Arrival feature, explaining what the feature does. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ peut utiliser la géolocalisation de votre téléphone pour informer le personnel de l\'établissement de soins de votre arrivée pour un rendez-vous. Il vous suffit de nous en notifier à partir de votre téléphone à l\'aide de la fonctionnalité Arrivée au rendez-vous et recevrez des instructions pour les étapes suivantes.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_begin_button
string.context: Title for the button to begin the process of turning on the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_enable_button
string.context: Title for the button to turn on the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_decline_button
string.context: Title for the button to opt-out of turning on the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_decline_reminder
string.context: Reminder that displays to the user, after opting-out, that they can enable Appointment Arrival later via Account Settings. Only displays in a Toast for 3.5 seconds, so translations should be equally succinct.

resources.string: Accédez aux Paramètres du compte de visite pour activer Arrivée au rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_location_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Location permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_bluetooth_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not turned on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a trademark and should not be translated.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_accessibility_enable_button_location_bluetooth_missing
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, appended to the Turn On Appointment Arrival button caption, explaining it is not enabled yet because the user has not granted Location permission or turned on Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a trademark and should not be translated.

resources.string: Activer en activant la géolocalisation et le Bluetooth.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_title
string.context: Title of permissions activity for the Appointment Arrival feature, where the user will be asked to grant certain permissions before Appointment Arrival can be enabled.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_instructions
string.context: Instructions at the top of the screen where the user will be asked to grant certain permissions before Appointment Arrival can be enabled.

resources.string: Pour activer Arrivée au rendez-vous, nous avons besoin des éléments suivants:

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_title
string.context: Name of the Bluetooth feature on the device. This should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages. In addition, the Registered Trademark symbol should be retained.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_title_accessibility
string.context: Name of the Bluetooth feature on the device, used specifically for accessibility so the Registered Trademark symbol is not read by screen readers. This should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_title_ios
string.context: Title for the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. This string should exactly match the name of the Location feature/concept that is listed in the Settings app on iOS across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_title_android
string.context: Title for the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android. This string should exactly match the name of the Location feature/concept that is listed in the Settings app on Android across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_instructions_ios
string.context: Label on the card that explains the location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

resources.string: Assurez-vous d\'avoir activé l\'autorisation de géolocalisation \"%1$@\" dans les paramètres de votre appareil.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_instructions_ios_precise
string.context: Label on the card that explains the location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

resources.string: Assurez-vous d\'avoir activé l\'autorisation de géolocalisation \"%1$@\" et la géolocalisation précise dans les paramètres de votre appareil.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_instructions_ios
string.context: Label on the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

resources.string: Assurez-vous que le Bluetooth est activé dans les paramètres de votre appareil.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_while_using_warning_ios
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has only enabled 'While Using' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_warning_android
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has only enabled 'While Using' location permission for Appointment Arrival on Android. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_while_using_warning_ios_precise
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has only enabled 'While Using' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

resources.string: Vous avez uniquement accordé l\'autorisation \"%1$@\" et n\'avez pas accordé la géolocalisation précise

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_permission_denied_warning_ios
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has denied location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS.

resources.string: Vous n\'avez pas accordé l\'autorisation de géolocalisation

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_precise_location_denied_warning_ios
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has denied precise location for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+.

resources.string: Vous n\'avez pas accordé la géolocalisation précise

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_permission_denied_warning_ios_precise
string.context: Text for a warning that appears if the user has denied location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

resources.string: Vous n\'avez pas accordé l\'autorisation de géolocalisation ou la géolocalisation précise

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_error_android
string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user denies location permissions for Appointment Arrival on Android.

resources.string: Afin d\'activer Arrivée au rendez-vous, nous avons besoin d\'accéder à votre géolocalisation.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_bluetooth_button_android
string.context: Title for a button to turn on Bluetooth for Appointment Arrival on Android. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_location_button_android
string.context: Title for a button to turn on location for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_location_button_android_always
string.context: Title for a button to turn on 'Always' location permission for Appointment Arrival on Android. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_location_button_ios
string.context: Title for a button to turn on 'Always' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_turn_on_location_button_ios_precise
string.context: Title for a button to turn on 'Always' location permission and precise location for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_confirmation_android
string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled Bluetooth on Android. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_confirmation_ios
string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled 'Always' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_error_ios
string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user has not enabled 'Always' location permission for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_confirmation_ios_precise
string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled precise location for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_error_ios_precise
string.context: Text for an error that appears if the user has not enabled precise location for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_confirmation_android
string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled location for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_confirmation_android_always
string.context: Text for a confirmation that appears if the user has enabled always allow location for Appointment Arrival on Android.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_learnmore_button
string.context: Label for the Learn More button in this activity, which a user can tap to learn more about a particular required permission for enabling Appointment Arrival.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_learnmore_p1
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival. 'Bluetooth' should not be translated into other languages - it is a trademark across all languages. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ utilise de petits appareils appelés balises Bluetooth, situés dans les zones de check-in de votre établissement de santé. Ces balises utilisent le Bluetooth pour émettre un signal que votre téléphone peut détecter.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_bluetooth_learnmore_p2
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Bluetooth permission requirements for Appointment Arrival.

resources.string: Si vous activez la fonctionnalité Arrivée au rendez-vous, votre téléphone recevra ce signal et vous invitera à signaler votre arrivée lorsque vous serez près de la zone de check-in pour votre rendez-vous.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_ios_p1
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission. %2$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: La fonctionnalité Arrivée au rendez-vous nécessite l\'autorisation de géolocalisation \"%1$@\". Cette autorisation permet à votre téléphone de vous inviter à effectuer votre check-in lorsque vous entrez dans une zone de check-in, même si %2$@ n\'est pas en cours d\'exécution.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_ios_p1_precise
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on iOS 14+. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission. %2$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: La fonctionnalité Arrivée au rendez-vous nécessite l\'autorisation de géolocalisation \"%1$@\" et votre géolocalisation précise. Ces autorisations permettent à votre téléphone de vous inviter à effectuer votre check-in lorsque vous entrez dans une zone de check-in, même si %2$@ n\'est pas en cours d\'exécution.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_android_p1
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: La fonctionnalité Arrivée au rendez-vous nécessite l\'accès à la géolocalisation. Cette accès permet à votre téléphone de vous inviter à effectuer votre check-in lorsque vous entrez dans une zone de check-in, même si %1$@ n\'est pas en cours d\'exécution.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_android_p1_always
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival on Android when we require always allow permission. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the Always permission. %2$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: La fonctionnalité Arrivée au rendez-vous nécessite l\'autorisation de géolocalisation \"%1$@\". Cette autorisation permet à votre téléphone de vous inviter à effectuer votre check-in lorsque vous entrez dans une zone de check-in, même si %2$@ n\'est pas en cours d\'exécution.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_permissions_activity_location_learnmore_p2
string.context: Text displayed to the user when they tap on the Learn More button in the card that explains the Location permission requirements for Appointment Arrival. %1$@ is the branded display name of the app.

resources.string: %1$@ n\'enregistre pas et ne suit pas vos données de géolocalisation et ne partagera jamais des informations de géolocalisation avec des tiers.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_is_user_initiated_arrival_allowed_alert
string.context: Text for springboard alert asking user whether they have arrived for their appt and would like to mark themselves as arrived. %1$@ is the time formatted like 11:30 AM in English.

resources.string: Êtes-vous arrivé(e) pour votre rendez-vous à %1$@? Informez l\'établissement de soins que vous êtes ici.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_title
string.context: Title of banner asking the user if they have arrived to their appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_title_proxy_subject
string.context: Title of banner asking the user if their proxy subject has arrived to their appointment. %1$@ is the proxy subject's nickname

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_body
string.context: Body of banner asking the user if they have arrived to their appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_body_proxy_subject
string.context: Body of banner asking the user if their proxy subject has arrived to their appointment. %1$@ is the proxy subject's nickname

resources.string: Est-ce que %1$@ est arrivé(e) pour ce rendez-vous?

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_button_proxy_subject
string.context: Button caption user is to tap if their proxy subject has arrived to their appointment. %1$@ is the proxy subject's nickname

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_check_in_error_title
string.context: Title of popup if the check in failed.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_check_in_error
string.context: Body of popup if the check in failed. The user is advised to try again - which is only available in some scenarios - or failing that, go to the clinics front desk to resolve this.

resources.string: Merci de nous avoir fait savoir que vous êtes ici, mais nous n\'avons pas pu notifier la réception. Veuillez réessayer plus tard ou vous rendre à la réception pour effectuer le check-in.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_button
string.context: Button caption user is to tap if they have arrived to their appointment

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_banner_title_checked_in
string.context: Title of banner if user has completely checked in for their appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_nextstep_checkedin_message
string.context: Message displayed if we were able to completely check the user in for their appointment, and no further action is required on their part.

resources.string: Votre check-in a été enregistré. Veuillez attendre que l\'on vous appelle.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_nextstep_default_message
string.context: Message displayed if we were not able to completely check the user in for their appointment, and they need to go to the front desk to proceed.

resources.string: Veuillez vous rendre à l\'Accueil pour finaliser votre check-in.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_checkin_announcement
string.context: Accessibility Message, read by screen reader, alerting the user to the appearance of a full-screen workflow, to allow the user to check in with the appointment arrival feature.

resources.string: Alerte. Le check-in d\'arrivée au rendez-vous s\'est affiché.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow. %1$@ is the display time of the appointment. The display time is in the hh:mm aa format. Ex. 10:35 AM

resources.string: Êtes-vous arrivé(e) pour votre rendez-vous à %1$@?

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long_no_time
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow. Used if the appointment date is invalid

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_alert_yes
string.context: The confirmation button for the appointment arrival workflow. This confirms the user is at the appointment and is ready to be check-in

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long_other
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow for a subject. %1$@ is the subject, %2$@ is the appointment display time. The display time is in the hh:mm aa format. Ex. 10:35 AM

resources.string: %1$@ est-il/elle arrivé(e) pour un rendez-vous à %2$@?

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_correct_time_dwell_message_long_other_no_time
string.context: The appointment arrival message shown when a user starts the appointment arrival workflow for a subject. Used if the appointment date is invalid. %1$@ is the subject.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_alert_subject_yes
string.context: The confirmation button for the appointment arrival alert for proxies. This confirms the patient is at the appointment and is ready to be check-in. %1$@ is the subject.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_alert_no
string.context: The decline button for the appointment arrival alert. This will snooze the arrival and ask the use again if they are ready in a few minutes (currently configured to 2 but could change in the future).

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_notification_title
string.context: The appointment arrival notification title. Showed as a title with more details below.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_nextstep_title
string.context: The appointment arrival title after user has confirmed their arrival. This has more details below it

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_echeckin_yes
string.context: The appointment arrival message after user has confirmed their arrival. This is for an appointment that requires eCheckin to be completed. %1$@ is the eCheckin custom name

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_appointment_cell_summary
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment, %2$@ is the provider, %3$@ is the date of the appointment. ex. 'Office Visit with House M.D. on Thursday, Jan 13 2015.'

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_appointment_cell_summary_brief
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell. %1$@ is the visit type and %2$@ is the date of the appointment. ex. 'Office Visit on Thursday, Jan 13 2015.'

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_appointment_cell_summary_department
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment, %2$@ is the department of the visit, %3$@ is the date of the appointment. ex. 'Office Visit at Cedar Oaks Emergency Department on Thursday, Jan 13 2015.'

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_appointment_cell_summary_provider_and_department
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment, %2$@ is the provider, %3$@ is the department of the visit, %4$@ is the date of the appointment. ex. 'Office Visit with House M.D. at Cedar Oaks Internal Medicine on Thursday, Jan 13 2015.'

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_unread_appointment_cell_summary
string.context: Voiceover text for the unviewed past encounter cells in Past encounter list. %1$@ is the viewed version of the accessibility label.

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_appointment_cell_summary_video_ready
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell that is a video visit that is ready for the user to join. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment, %2$@ is the provider, %3$@ is the date of the appointment. ex. 'Office Visit with House M.D. on Thursday, Jan 13 2015. Ready to begin video visit.'

resources.string: %1$@ avec %2$@ le %3$@. Prêt à commencer la consultation vidéo.

string.name: wp_appointments_acc_appointment_cell_summary_video_not_ready
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell that is a video visit that is not ready for the user to join. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment, %2$@ is the provider, %3$@ is the date of the appointment. ex. 'Office Visit with House M.D. on Thursday, Jan 13 2015. This is a video visit.'

resources.string: %1$@ avec %2$@ le %3$@. Ceci est une consultation vidéo.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_appointment_cell_summary_barcode_ready
string.context: The voiceover text for an appointment cell that is echecked in with a barcode. %1$@ is the visit type of the appointment, %2$@ is the provider, %3$@ is the date of the appointment, %4$@ is the custom string for 'eCheck-in'. ex. 'Office Visit with House M.D. on Thursday, Jan 13 2015. Barcode available for eCheck-in.'

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_call_button_string
string.context: Accessibility string telling the user to make a phone call to the given phone number. This particular string is used in the appointments page where the phone number will be the number for the provider or department. %1$@ is the phone number of the provider or department.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_map_button_string
string.context: Accessibility string for the map button on the future appointment details page. The string will tell the user what the address is for the appointment. Then, it will prompt them to open up the address on a map. %1$@ is the address of the appointment - like 1234 Epic Lane, Madison, WI 56372

resources.string: Ce rendez-vous est à l\'adresse %1$@. Afficher sur une carte.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_barcode_image
string.context: Voiceover text to indicate that the image is of a barcode to scan to check in when arriving at an appointment.

resources.string: Code-barres à scanner pour le check-in.

plurals.name: wp_appointment_acc_cancel_appointment_button
plurals.context: Voiceover text for a button that a user can press to cancel an upcoming appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_cancel_reschedule_appointment_button
string.context: Voiceover text for a button that a user can press to cancel or reschedule an upcoming appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_reschedule_appointment_button
string.context: Voiceover text for a button that a user can press to reschedule an upcoming appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_data_h2g_incomplete
string.context: The voiceoover text when happy together data failed to load from 1 or moore external organizations. This string shows no the appointment list page in the section headers (with the sections being future appointments, past appointments, etc. This string just alerts the user that some appointments or other data (like wait list entries) might be missing.

resources.string: Avertissement. Les données du rendez-vous sont peut-être incomplètes.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_composite_visit_part
string.context: For a panel appointment that is comprised of multiple child visits, this is the voiceover string telling the user which part of the visit this is. For example, a patient could have a panel appointment with 4 appointments on the same day. This string indicates which of those visits the information refers to. %1$@ is the position of the child appointment in the list of child appointments making up the panel appointment.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_early_arrival_reason_button
string.context: accessibility label for the arrival time reason icon in the future appointment details

resources.string: Obtenez une explication pour l\'heure d\'arrivée

string.name: wp_visit_acc_map_button_string
string.context: Accessibility string for the map button on the future visit details page. The string will tell the user what the address is for the visit. Then, it will prompt them to open up the address on a map. %1$@ is the address of the visit - like 1234 Epic Lane, Madison, WI 56372

resources.string: Cette visite est à l\'adresse %1$@. Afficher sur une carte.

string.name: wp_visit_acc_cancel_visit_button
string.context: Voiceover text for a button that a user can press to cancel an upcoming visit.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_fast_pass_new_offer
string.context: Voiceover string for linked fast pass offer. %1$@ is new offer's visit type (e.g. Office Visit), %2$@ is new offer's date (format: En-US August 23),%3$@ is new offer's time (format: En-Us 8:26 AM), %4$@ is new offer's provider, %5$@ is new offer's department (e.g. Family Medicine).

resources.string: Une nouvelle proposition de rendez-vous est disponible pour %1$@, le %2$@ à %3$@ avec %4$@ dans le service %5$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_linked_fast_pass_offer
string.context: Voiceover string for linked fast pass offer. %1$@ is current appointment's visit type (e.g. Office Visit), %2$@ is current appointment's date (format: En-US August 23),%3$@ is current appointment's time (format: En-Us 8:26 AM), %4$@ is current appointment's provider, %5$@ is current appointment's department (e.g. Family Medicine).

resources.string: Ceci remplacera le rendez-vous actuel pour %1$@ le %2$@ à %3$@ avec %4$@ dans le service %5$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_linked_fast_pass_offer_keep_button
string.context: Voiceover string for keep button in linked fast pass offer. %1$@ is current offer's date (format: En-US August 23), %2$@ is current offer's time (format: En-Us 8:26 AM), %3$@ is current offer's provider, %4$@ is current offer's department (e.g. Family Medicine).

resources.string: Conserver le rendez-vous actuel le %1$@ à %2$@ avec %3$@ dans le service %4$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_shared_fast_pass_offer_accept_button
string.context: Voiceover string for accept button in both linked and standalone fast pass offer. %1$@ is new offer's date (format: En-US August 23), %2$@ is new offer's time (format: En-Us 8:26 AM), %3$@ is new offer's provider, %4$@ is new offer's department (e.g. Family Medicine).

resources.string: Accepter cette proposition de rendez-vous pour le %1$@ à %2$@ avec %3$@ dans le service %4$@.

string.name: wp_appointment_acc_standalone_fast_pass_offer_decline_button
string.context: Voiceover string for decline button in standalone fast pass offer. %1$@ is new offer's date (format: En-US August 23), %2$@ is new offer's time (format: En-Us 8:26 AM), %3$@ is new offer's provider, %4$@ is new offer's department (e.g. Family Medicine).

resources.string: Refuser cette proposition de rendez-vous pour le %1$@ à %2$@ avec %3$@ dans le service %4$@.

string.context: Default title used for On My Way activity

string.context: Button title for declining to give permissions for location

string.name: wp_location_go_to_settings_button
string.context: Button title for jump to settings to turn on location permissions

string.name: wp_location_alert_title
string.context: Title for the alert to ask the user to go to settings to enable location services

string.name: wp_location_alert_message
string.context: Message in the alert ot let the user know why we are asking them to go to settings and turn on While Using location permissions. %1$@ is the language-specific name of the While Using permission.

resources.string: Votre géolocalisation est utilisée pour trouver des prestataires de santé près de vous. Activer les autorisations de géolocalisation \"%1$@\" pour utiliser cette fonctionnalité.

string.name: wp_permissions_location_iOS_always
string.context: The name of the iOS location permission that allows access to location at all times. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on iOS, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'The Appointment Arrival feature requires 'Always' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_permissions_location_iOS_while_using
string.context: The name of the iOS location permission that allows access to location while the app is in use. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on iOS, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'This feature requires 'While Using' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_permissions_location_Android_while_using
string.context: The name of the iOS location permission that allows access to location while the app is in use. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on Android, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'This feature requires 'While Using' location permissions.'

string.name: wp_permissions_location_Android_always
string.context: The name of the Android location permission that allows access to location at all times. It should exactly match the name of the associated permission in the Settings app on Android, across all languages. This string will be inserted into other strings, generally in quotes, to form strings such as 'The Appointment Arrival feature requires 'All the time' location permissions.'

Appuyez pour afficher plus d\'alertes sur le site Web pour: %1$@.

string.name: wp_test_results_ref_range_two_values
string.context: Text read by the screen reader to indicate the standard reference range for this result component. %1$@ is the low end of the range, %2$@ is the high end of the range, %3$@ is the units of the component. This resource will itself be inserted into another resource, forming an overall string like 'The standard range is 4 to 5 mL.'

string.name: wp_test_results_ref_range_one_value
string.context: Text read by the screen reader to indicate the standard reference range for this result component, when either only a low or only a high is present. %1$@ is the low or high end of the range, %2$@ is the units of the component. This resource will itself be inserted into another resource, forming an overall string like 'The standard range is 4 mL.'

string.name: wp_compose_topiclabel
string.context: Label for a customer service message's topic. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_compose_topichint
string.context: Hint for choosing a customer service message topic. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_compose_tohinttype
string.context: Hint for typing in the recipient of a message

string.name: wp_compose_tohintchoose
string.context: Hint for choosing a recipient of a message

string.name: wp_compose_subjecthinttype
string.context: Hint for typing in the subject of a message. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_compose_subjecthintchoose
string.context: Hint for choosing the subject of a message. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_message_topics
string.context: Prompt for choosing a topic of a customer service message. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.name: wp_compose_alert_choosetopic
string.context: Alert displays when Send is pressed but no topic is chosen for a customer service message. Note that mychart differentiates Topic and Subject in messages, where subject is akin to an email subject line, and topic is the general subject matter the inquiry falls within. Topics are always a pre-selected category like Benefits and Eligibility. Subjects are the message heading to the recipient which can be either freetext or predefined category.

string.context: Title for the message type menu. A message type is a classification of message: customer service, medical advice. These represent different pools/reviewers on the receiving end.

string.context: Indicates that a measurement of blood glucose was taken after a meal

string.context: label for a field that lets the user choose a value for whether a blood glucose reading was taken before or after a meal

string.context: Label for data about insulin (medication for diabetes) delivered/administered to a patient

string.context: Label for data about insulin delivery where the insulin was administered to meet basic metabolic needs throughout the day i.e. insulin injected slowly by a pump or larger injections of slow-acting insulin

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus
string.context: Label for data about insulin delivery where the insulin was administered to meet episodic requirements i.e. around the time of a meal

string.context: Hourly collected basal insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_hourly
string.context: Hourly collected bolus insulin data

string.context: Daily collected basal insulin data

string.context: Monthly collected basal insulin data

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_monthly
string.context: Monthly collected bolus insulin data
