string.context: label indicating that a data type is measured in generic units

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading
string.context: This string is deprecated and does not need translation

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_metadata
string.context: This string is deprecated and does not need translation

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_new
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) giving the flowsheet title, the value of the reading and then the value of the date/instant. %1$@ is the flowsheet reading. %2$@ is the value of the cell, %3$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937) of the cell and %4$@ is the instant

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_metadata_new
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) giving the flowsheet title, the value of the reading and then the value of the date/instant. %1$@ is the flowsheet reading. %2$@ is the value of the cell, %3$@ is metadata for the reading (e.g. 'after meal' for a blood glucose reading), %4$@ is the date (long format: En-US November 23, 1937) of the cell and %5$@ is the instant

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_contains_abnormal_data
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) after reading either wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_new or wp_trackmyhealth_flowsheet_cell_reading_metadata_new, informing the user that the reading contains abnormal values (like atypically low blood pressure).

resources.string: Cette ligne contient des valeurs anormales. Envisager d\'en discuter avec votre prestataire de santé.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_accessibility_blood_pressure_reading
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screen reader) reading aloud a blood pressure. In en-us, this is SystolicValue over DiastolicValue. %1$@ is the systolic value. %2$@ is the diastolic value.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_basal_insulin_delivery
string.context: Data type for basal insulin delivery meaning insulin administered to meet the user’s basic metabolic needs.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_bolus_insulin_delivery
string.context: Data type for bolus insulin delivery meaning insulin administered to meet the user’s episodic requirements.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_glucose_graph_help_text
string.context: Help text about a graph of blood pressure data. 'Show daily trends' is the wp_trackmyhealth_show_daily_trends string. The backslashes and quotes should stay in the translated string

resources.string: Basculer le bouton \"Afficher les tendances quotidiennes\" sur le graphique fait afficher une barre pour chaque heure de la journée. En prenant en compte toutes les données de la semaine/du mois/de l\'année sélectionné(e), chaque barre représente les relevés minimum et maximum enregistrés durant cette heure de la journée. Un point représente la valeur moyenne durant cette heure.

string.name: wp_flowsheet_blood_pressure_incomplete
string.context: The alert that appears when one of systolic and diastolic is missing

resources.string: La mesure de la tension artérielle est incomplète.

string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the current day.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_week
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the last week.

resources.string: Afficher les relevés de la semaine dernière

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_month
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the last month.

resources.string: Afficher les relevés du mois dernier

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_year
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the day button on the segmented date control. Informs the user that selecting this button will show readings for the last year.

resources.string: Afficher les relevés de l\'année dernière

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_range
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the date interval on the segmented date control. Informs the user of the current date range selected. %1$@ is the start date. %2$@ is the end date.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_display_range_today
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the date interval on the segmented date control. Informs the user the current date range selected is today. %1$@ is the current date.

resources.string: Affichage des données pour aujourd\'hui, le %1$@

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_row_summary
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the summary of a cell on the flowsheeet detail page. The cell displays the data for a flowsheet row, %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet row, %2$@ is the value displayed on the row, %3$@ is the unit for the row

resources.string: %1$@ avec le relevé le plus récent, %2$@ %3$@

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_row_summary_no_reading
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the summary of a cell on the flowsheet detail page that has no reading. %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet row.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_tap_for_details
string.context: Voiceover hint (read by screenreader) for a flowsheet row that has data. Tapping the row will take the user to a detailed page with all the readings for that row. The string defined here will be prefixed by 'Tap to'

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_add_readings_btn
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the Add readings button that lets you add new readings to a flowsheet. %1$@ is the name of the flowsheet.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_reading_value
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for labeling the value displayed in a cell when adding/editing flowsheet readings, possibility of %3$@ to be empty if reading has no units. $1$s is the name of the row, %2$@ is the value of the reading. %3$@ is the unit for the row.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_no_reading_value
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) when there is no value displayed in a cell when adding/editing flowsheet readings. $1$s is the name of the row.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_systolic_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the systolic text entry field in the add readings view.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_diastolic_text
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for the diastolic text entry field in the add readings view.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_bp_readings_label
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) for labeling the blood pressure cell when viewing the blood pressure cell. If no reading, $2$s and %3$@ use wp_trackmyhealth_acc_no_reading_value. %1$@ is the row title of the cell. %2$@ is the value of the systolic reading. %3$@ is the value of the diastolic reading.

string.name: wp_trackmyhealth_acc_healthapp_sync
string.context: Voiceover text (read by screenreader) signifying that the image is just a graphic and shows the link between the device and the user's MyChart. %1$@ is the app name, i.e. MyChart.

resources.string: %1$@ peut recevoir des données de Google Fit

string.name: wp_account_settings_choose_default_person_setting_title_patient

string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to change/remove the default patient they will start viewing immediately after login. Used when a default is set and the user is a patient themselves.

string.name: wp_account_settings_choose_default_person_setting_title_account
string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to set the default account they will start viewing immediately after login. Used when a default is NOT set and the user is NOT a patient themselves.

string.name: wp_account_settings_change_default_person_setting_title_account
string.context: Title for the setting that allows the user to change/remove the default account they will start viewing immediately after login. Used when a default is set and the user is NOT a patient themselves.

string.name: wp_account_settings_current_default_person_setting_text
string.context: Text that indicates the current default person set for the user. %1$@ is the name for the person currently set as the default

string.name: wp_account_settings_default_person_setting_description
string.context: Description for the setting that allows the user to set/change/remove the default person they will start viewing immediately after login.

resources.string: Choisissez qui vous voulez voir en premier lorsque vous vous connectez. Sans choix par défaut, il vous sera demandé de sélectionner quelqu\'un chaque fois que vous vous connectez.

string.name: wp_account_settings_default_person_alert_title
string.context: Title for the alert that prompts the user to choose/change/remove the default person they will start viewing immediately after login.

resources.string: Qui voulez-vous voir en premier lorsque vous vous connectez?

string.name: wp_account_settings_default_person_remove_button
string.context: Title for a button to remove the user's default person selection. Without a default, the user will be asked which person they want to view every time they log in.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_setting_title
string.context: Title for the setting that enables or disables the Appointment Arrival feature.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_setting_description
string.context: Description for the setting that enabled or disables the Appointment Arrival feature.

resources.string: Utilisez la géolocalisation de votre téléphone pour notifier l\'accueil de votre arrivée.

string.name: wp_appointment_arrival_setting_description_bluetooth
string.context: Description for the setting that enabled or disables the Appointment Arrival feature. Specific to organizations that also use Bluetooth beacons.

resources.string: Grâce à Bluetooth, utilisez la géolocalisation de votre téléphone pour notifier l\'accueil de votre arrivée.

string.name: wp_account_settings_empty_field_accessibility_text
string.context: Accessibility text for the email and phone field when they are empty

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_row_text
string.context: Title for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_default
string.context: Default description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch.

resources.string: Consultez vos informations de santé directement dans votre application Apple Watch.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_need_ios14
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch - informs the user that this feature requires iOS 14 for use.

resources.string: Veuillez installer iOS 14 et WatchOS 7 pour utiliser cette fonctionnalité.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_org_lacks_feature
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch - informs the user that the organization does not support this feature (likely because their Epic version is too low), but that it will be available soon (when the customer upgrades to May20 or later). %1$@ is the organization's name (eg UW Health)

resources.string: Des améliorations à cette application sont en cours. Elles seront bientôt disponibles pour %1$@.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_change_org
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch when the watch is linked to a different organization.

resources.string: Changer les informations affichées sur votre Apple Watch de %1$@ à %2$@.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_footer_text_change_user
string.context: Description for the setting that links or unlinks the Apple Watch when the watch is linked to this organization, but to a different user/mychart account.

resources.string: Déconnectez l\'utilisateur actuel de cette montre et liez votre propre compte.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_overwrite_linked_org_alert_title
string.context: Title of the alert shown when a patient attempts to link their Apple Watch when it is already linked to another organization.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_overwrite_linked_org_alert_message
string.context: Message of the alert shown when a patient attempts to link their Apple Watch when it is already linked to another organization. %1$@ is the name of the linked org, %2$@ is the name of the current org.

resources.string: Votre Apple Watch est actuellement liée à %1$@. Voulez-vous plutôt la lier à %2$@?

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_overwrite_linked_user_alert_title
string.context: Title of the alert shown when a patient attempts to link their Apple Watch when it is already linked to another mychart user.

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_overwrite_linked_user_alert_message
string.context: Message of the alert shown when a patient attempts to link their Apple Watch when it is already linked to another mychart user.

resources.string: Un autre utilisateur est actuellement connecté sur cette montre Apple Watch. Voulez-vous plutôt vous y connecter?

string.name: wp_account_settings_apple_watch_overwrite_linked_org_alert_button
string.context: Title for a button that links to the Apple Watch by overwriting a previously linked organization.

string.name: wp_connecting_to_website
string.context: message below loading indicator indicating that the app is talking to / connecting to the web server before loading content

resources.string: Connexion au site Web en cours...

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_title
string.context: This the title that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_instructions
string.context: This string appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. These are the general instructions to the user that remain constant throughout the linking process. %1$@ is the branded MyChart name.

resources.string: Pour commencer, ouvrez %1$@ sur votre Apple Watch et gardez-la près de cet appareil.​

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_instructions_line_2
string.context: See wp_linkapplewatch_instructions. This appears as a paragraph line under that resource

resources.string: Veillez à garder cet écran ouvert sur cet appareil jusqu\'à ce que le processus de liaison soit terminé.​

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_watch_os_disclaimer
string.context: This string appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with a disclaimer informing them of the minimum watchOS version required for the MyChart for Apple Watch app. %1$@ is the branded MyChart name.

resources.string: %1$@ pour Apple Watch nécessite watchOS 7 ou version ultérieure et une Apple Watch Série 3 ou version ultérieure.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_waiting_for_reachable_watch_app
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the user must have their watch near their phone and launch the mychart application on the apple watch. %1$@ is the branded MyChart name.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_install_watch_app
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the user has not yet installed the MyChart app on their watch, and must do so through Apple's 'Watch' app on the iPhone. %1$@ is the branded MyChart name.

resources.string: Veuillez installer l\'application %1$@ Watch sur votre Apple Watch avant de continuer.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_is_linking
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the phone and watch are currently linking, and once linked, it the watch will show the same health feed the user sees on their phone for the currently logged-in organization.

resources.string: Liaison de votre Apple Watch en cours.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_successfully_linked
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that the linking process is done. The screen will dismiss itself automatically shortly after showing this message.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_failed_to_link
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. This status indicates that something went wrong during the linking processes. If the user wishes to link, they must close the screen and try again.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_unhandled_error
string.context: This a status message that appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization. If this message appears, it is because the phone has lost bluetooth connectivity (or never had it) with the watch.

resources.string: Impossible de se connecter à Apple Watch pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.​

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_troubleshoot_link
string.context: This string appears on a button which when clicked shows troubleshooting tips. The button is on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with instructions and feedback about the status of linking their apple watch to the current organization

resources.string: Vous rencontrez des difficultés pour vous connecter à votre Apple Watch? Cliquez ici pour obtenir des conseils de dépannage.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_restart_devices_tip
string.context: This string appears on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with troubleshooting tips on how to link their MyChart app to their Apple Watch. %1$@ is the branded MyChart name.

resources.string: Si vous avez du mal à relier %1$@ à votre Apple Watch, essayez de redémarrer les deux appareils.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_restart_iphone_link
string.context: This string appears on a button linking to Apple's support page for restarting an iPhone. The button is on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with troubleshooting tips.

string.name: wp_linkapplewatch_restart_watch_link
string.context: This string appears on a button linking to Apple's support page for restarting an Apple Watch. The button is on a full-screen modal popover activity that provides the user with troubleshooting tips.

string.name: wp_personal_information_title
string.context: Title for the activity that allows the user to verify the contact information.

string.name: wp_contact_verification_popup_mobile
string.context: Text for the popup that allows the user to verify the mobile phone number.

resources.string: Nous devons nous assurer que nous pouvons vous joindre à votre numéro de téléphone.

string.name: wp_contact_verification_popup_email
string.context: Text for the popup that allows the user to verify the email address.

resources.string: Nous devons nous assurer que nous pouvons vous joindre à votre adresse e-mail.

string.name: wp_contact_verification_popup_both
string.context: Text for the popup that allows the user to verify the email address and mobile phone number.

resources.string: Nous devons nous assurer que nous pouvons vous joindre à votre adresse e-mail et numéro de téléphone.

string.name: wp_contact_verification_verify_button
string.context: Title for the button in the popup that will jump the user to verify their contact information.

string.name: wp_contact_verification_later_button
string.context: Title for the button in the popup that will dismiss the popup.

string.name: wp_pregnancy_hub_title
string.context: Title used for Care Companion pregnancy updates activity

resources.string: Mises à jour de la grossesse

string.name: wp_springboard_goal_accessibility_string
string.context: Accessibility string for a goal card. %1$@ is the title for the goal. %2$@ is the patient's last reading of the goal. %3$@ is the time when the goal was last reported on.

plurals.name: wp_springboard_new_notifications_accessibility_text
plurals.context: Accessibility text that reads out the alert badge which indicates the number of new notifications. Can be used for activities, as well as patient tabs. %1$@ is the number of notifications

string.name: wp_springboard_new_notifications_no_count_accessibility_text
string.context: Accessibility text that reads out the alert badge for an activity that has a bang as an alert, without a number for the alerts

string.name: wp_springboard_patientbar_myrecord_accessibility_text
string.context: Accessibility text for the logged in user's record that is read when their own record is selected in the patient bar

string.name: wp_springboard_patientbar_subject_accessibility_text
string.context: Accessibility text for a subject's record that is read when their record is selected in the patient bar. %1$@ is the name of the subject.
